column2: "Woo hoo hoooo! She can sing! And dance! She's an in-for-mant! It's Patty!"
"That's less dancing and more duncing. Oh, greetings. Tea here."
"I was trying to act upbeat, but I guess it flopped..."
"Oh, is that what you were going for... You were your usual obnoxious self, so I didn't even notice."
"You're so cold, Tea! Have some mercy for your exhausted older sister!"
"Everyone is exhausted. The people risking it on the frontlines have it even worse."
"All of this is that Shiva jerk's fault! Holding her back is too hard!"
"We've been able to maintain our position thanks to everyone's efforts, and having the A.I.S. run at full capacity..."
"They're too dang strong! They're too dang creepy! All our Photons get slurped right up, so we can barely even hurt them!"
"Aww, man... Isn't there any info out there on how to get rid of that Shiva?"
"That'd be nice... But it's our job to look for it, if it exists."

"Info on how to beat Shiva...
Hm? Wait, what about..."
"Ah, I've got just the scoop, in fact! A big one! An entire battle plan to take Shiva down!"
"Really? That's the first I've heard of it... My expectations are minimal, but go ahead."
"Well, maximize them! I've witnessed these findings firsthand, so I know it's legit!"
"Huh... so, it's real? You knew something that important... So what's the plan...?!"
"The plan's name is...! 'The Great Big Tickle'!"
"...Shut up, you idiot."
"Aurora's a Photoner just like Shiva, and tickling her provides extraordinary results!"
"Ughh... And? How exactly do we tickle her? The A.I.S. are the only way we can get close..."
"That's it! With the A.I.S. we can get right up next to her and unleash the tickles!"
"We can ask Ludmilla to make some adjustments, and add a bunch of arms like a crab..."
"It'll be the ARKS' ultimate weapon... the 'A.I.S. Patty Custom'! Quiz time! What is its most distinguishing feature?"
"It can tickle?"
"It looks like a crab?"
"Yes, exactly right! It can defeat Shiva with its tickle attack! Leave it to the Guardian to get a perfect score!"
"Yes, exactly right! The crabby look is sure to be popular... No, that's not right!"
"Either way, it'll beat Shiva! Now that that's settled, I need to go file those requests with Ludmilla!"
"Wh- there's no way that's gonna work! I'm going too... As an ARKS informant, I have to exhaust every possibility I can."
"Dang it, you idiot! Wait for me!"
